title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Large Language Models & Generative AI
summary: The Intelligence Platform team at Apple is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to work on Large Language Models and Generative AI to empower next generation user experiences.
description: As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be responsible for leading the exploration and application of Large Language Models and Generative AI, translating research into high-performing systems, setting strategic directions, and collaborating with teams to implement Machine Learning solutions.
key_qualifications:
- In-depth experience in Machine Learning, with a particular emphasis on Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI.
- Published research in the field of Machine Learning or AI.
- Proven ability to apply cutting-edge research into tangible applications.
- Knowledge and hands-on experience with fine-tuning approaches and training models.
- Problem-solving and leadership abilities.
education_experience: An advanced degree (Master's or Ph.D.) in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or related field is required. Ongoing professional development in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence domains is expected.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $175,800 and $312,200, determined based on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Other benefits include employee stock programs, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, educational expense reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, relocation support, and more.
